channel.title: Sourdough on newt@noslogan
channel.description: Recent content in Sourdough on newt@noslogan

item.title: Sourdough Muffins
item.description: This makes about 20-24 muffins. They are best when you eat them absolutely fresh. Just make sure they are cooked enough. They aren’t like the one you buy in the supermarket - they’re a bit more dense. You can cook them until they start to brown.

item.title: Sourdough Pancakes
item.description: This always feels like cheating because there’s baking soda and powder as well as sourdough but it makes really tasty pancakes.
